column2: Example of arguments to estimate parameters of extentions of the IM model.
There is no more than 3 values after a keyword.

column1: ## theta_1=4N1*mu - Population 1 mutation rates per bp per generation. NEEDS TO BE SPECIFIED.

column4: # If only theta_1 is specified, then N_1=N_2=N_A by default

column1: ## M_p=4N_1*m_p - Gene flow rate at present (0<t<inf or 0<t<T_s or 0<t<T_c).
## M_p needs to be specified if at least one of the genomic regions considered has n_1>0 and n_2>0 and T_split is not specified.
### 1 value specified: The parameter is fixed to this value.
### 3 values specified: Defined the UNIFORM prior for the parameter: lower, upper limit and number of values to investigate within this range.
## theta_2=4N2*mu - Population 2 mutation rates per bp per generation. Default, theta_2=theta_1.
## theta_2=4N2*mu - Population 2 mutation rates per bp per generation. Default, theta_A=theta_1.
## T_s - Time of split in unit of 4N_1 generations. Default, T_s=0.

column4: # T_s The split timeis fixed to 1

column1: ## epsilon=T_c/T_sT_c - T_c=Time when the gene flow rate changed in unit of 4N_1 generations.Default, T_c/T_s=0.
## M_c=4N_1*m_c - The rate of gene flow for T_c<t<T_s. Default, M_c=0.
## rho=4N_1*c - Genomic average population intra-region recombination rate per bp per generation.
## The region-specific recombination rate per generation is rho*w*(L-1). Default, rho=0.

column5: # KNOWN region-specific population recombination rate per bp per generation: w=rho_o*beta in the file regfile.
# KNOWN region-specific cross-ver rate per bp per generation: w=c_o*beta in the file regfile. Specifies mu=2e-8.

column4: # UNKNOWNintra-region recombination rate. c_r/mu~exp(lambda=.6). rho=theta_1*c_r/mu for region r.
# UNKNOWNintra-region recombination rate. c_r/mu~Normal(nu=1,sigma=1). rho=theta_1*c_r/mu for region r.

column1: ## R - Number of genomic regions considered. Default, R=1.
## H - Number of data sets to simulate per set of parameters. Default, H=1000.
## J - Number of jobs to run in parallel. Default, J=1.

column4: # The likelihood will be estimated via 10 parallel jobs
